testcase.name: singleFileUpload

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. XML path fileName doesn't match. Expected: jira.pdf Actual: <nullnullnullThe Internetnullnullnullnullnullnull $(document).foundation(); nullnullFile Uploaded! jira.pdf nullElemental Selenium>
